      • bfs

        private static boolean bfs(int[][] rGraph,
                           int s,
                           int t,
                           int[] parent)
        Parameters:
        rGraph -
        s -
        t -
        parent -
        Returns:
        Returns true if there is a path from source 's' to sink 't' in residual graph. Also fills parent[] to store the path

      • dfs

        private static void dfs(int[][] rGraph,
                        int s,
                        boolean[] visited)
        A DFS based function to find all reachable vertices from s. The function marks visited[i] as true if i is reachable from s. The initial values in visited[] must be false. We can also use BFS to find reachable vertices
        Parameters:
        rGraph -
        s - source
        visited - array to check visited vertices

      • MaxFlowMinCut

        private static void MaxFlowMinCut(int[][] graph,
                                  int s,
                                  int t)
        Prints the maximum flow and corresponding minimum s-t cut
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph in the problem
        s - source
        t - sink

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Driver Program Creates the graph and calls the method to apply MaxFlow and MinCut
        Parameters:
        args -
